title: Un jour je courirai moins
subtitle: Sound installation
description: Made at the espace29, this sound and digital installation explores the limits between organic and mechanical motion through a system of rotating charcoals
lead: Made during a three-day residency, this sound and digital installation explores the limits between organic/intentioned and mechanical motions. This device presenting a serie of rotating charcoals and sound composition will be exhibited on December 15th 2017 at the espace29 in Bordeaux.

coverImage.alt: Cover picture of the digital installation

paragraphs: This work, first thought and elaborated in Paris with the collective I am a member of, has been then produced during a three day residency, on July 31 and August 1st and 2nd 2017. At this stage, the owl project was already known.

On the pedestal made of medium wood, 5 metal stems support small motors driving charcoals of various sizes. These modules, arranged inequally on the canvas and presenting slight variations of form (height, widthâ€¦) are moving at various speed.

The sound of the charcoals scratching on the board is then recorded, processed, amplified and played with a sound system nearby. At this sound others will be added to produce a generative composition echoing the rotations of the motors.

The accumulation of round-trips, the many researches for a state of comfort, the incontrolled desir and its distant resolution produce a daily motion. This installation tries to illustrate some of its aspects. By playing with amplification and reverb effects, the composition tries to spark sensations of scaling and shrinking.
Still under development, the installation will be exhibited on December 15th at the espace29 in Bordeaux.
